briefdescription.para: client in the process of disconnecting to ws
client in the process of connecting from ws

parameterdescription.para: set of functions to call back when server report events.
optional pointer to a pre-initialized logconf

simplesect.para: newly created WebSockets handle, free with ws_cleanup()

briefdescription.para: Free a WebSockets handle created with ws_init()

parameterdescription.para: the WebSockets handle created with ws_init()

memberdef.argsstring: (struct websockets *ws, const char base_url[], const char ws_protocols[])
memberdef.name: ws_set_url

briefdescription.para: Set the URL for the WebSockets handle to connect.

parameterdescription.para: the WebSockets handle created with ws_init()
the URL to connect, such as ws://echo.websockets.org

briefdescription.para: Send a text message of given size.

detaileddescription.para: Text messages do not need to include the null terminator (\0), they will be read up to len.

parameterdescription.para: the WebSockets handle created with ws_init()
the pointer to memory (linear) to send.
the length in bytes of text.

simplesect.para: true if sent, false on errors.

briefdescription.para: Signals connecting state before entering the WebSockets event loop.

parameterdescription.para: the WebSockets handle created with ws_init()
the WebSockets handle created with ws_init()
receives true if the client is running and false otherwise
limit amount in milliseconds to wait for until activity
the WebSockets handle created with ws_init()

simplesect.para: the timestamp in milliseconds from when ws_perform() was last called
the timestamp is updated at every ws_perform() call

briefdescription.para: Returns the WebSockets handle connection status.

parameterdescription.para: the WebSockets handle created with ws_init()

briefdescription.para: Returns a enum ws_close_reason opcode in a string format.

parameterdescription.para: the opcode to be converted to string

simplesect.para: a read-only string literal of the opcode

briefdescription.para: Check if a WebSockets connection is alive.

parameterdescription.para: the WebSockets handle created with ws_init()

simplesect.para: TRUE if WebSockets status is different than WS_DISCONNECTED, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if WebSockets connection is active.

parameterdescription.para: the WebSockets handle created with ws_init()

simplesect.para: true if is function, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: File containing internal functions and datatypes for WebSockets client.
